song_lyrics: Santmā ho santmā Shrījī ane santmā
Shrījīnā bol chhe mahimā atol chhe
Karu chhu sadā hu nivās santmā... 1
Santmā sadāy faru jīvne bhavpār karu
Santo jyā gān kare suṇtā santāp hare
Samajī lyo sānmā bhajan karo tānmā
Joyā chhe Shrījī me āj santmā... 6
title: Santmā ho santmā Shrījī ane santmā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-132: Vallabhdas

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
